title: OpenTelemetry Is Expanding Into CI/CD Observability
author: OpenTelemetry Authors; Docs CC BY
description: We’ve been talking about the need for a common “language” for reporting and observing CI/CD pipelines for years, and finally, we see the first “words” of this language entering the “dictionary” of observability—the OpenTelemetry open specification. With the recent release of OpenTelemetry’s Semantic Conventions, v1.27.0, you can find designated attributes for reporting CI/CD pipelines. This is the result of the hard work of the CI/CD Observability Special Interest Group (SIG) within OpenTelemetry. As we accomplish this core milestone for the first phase, we thought it’d be a good time to share it with the world.
cntitle: OpenTelemetry 正在扩展到 CI/CD 可观测性
cndescription: 多年来，我们一直在讨论需要一种通用的“语言”来报告和观察 CI/CD 流水线，最终，我们看到了这种语言的第一个“词”进入可观测性的“词典”——OpenTelemetry 开放规范。随着最近发布的 OpenTelemetry 的语义约定 v1.27.0，您可以找到用于报告 CI/CD 流水线的指定属性。这是 OpenTelemetry 中 CI/CD 可观测性特殊兴趣小组 (SIG) 努力工作的结果。当我们完成第一阶段的这个核心里程碑时，我们认为现在是与世界分享它的好时机。
